Good Comments:
At first, I was even thinking about going from Frostii to Clover. I was in love with the literal translations.
But then I watched the second half of the episode. Spelling mistakes, grammar mistakes, awful colloquial english. Too many mistakes.
Some of their translation are eh.. interesting to say the least. They should improve their use of grammar or recruit a better editor/tlchecker.
Bad Comments: Way too literal translations.  It's hard to read.
Typos everywhere, weird wording that makes no sense
Translation is so so. But suggest an editor or sth... Silly mistakes... and need better flow... its a bit hard to read.
